text: int arr [ 5050 ] , max = 0 , row = 0 ; void findsum ( int sum , int i , int j , int n ) { int sum1 , sum2 ; if ( n > row - 1 ) { if ( sum > max ) max = sum ; return ; } sum1 = sum + arr [ i + n + j ] ; sum2 = sum + arr [ i + n + j + 1 ] ; findsum ( sum1 , i + n , j , n + 1 ) ; findsum ( sum2 , i + n , j + 1 , n + 1 ) ; } int main ( void ) { int i , t = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & row ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < ( row * ( row + 1 ) / 2 ) ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; i = arr [ 0 ] ; findsum ( i , 0 , 0 , 1 ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
